name: Galactic Looter
description:
Overview

Just a hobby project that I develop in a free time. Inspired by such games as Enter the Gungeon, Deep Rock Galactic and so on.

Short story

Once upon a time a bright light lit up this sector. And then... the big impact left all nearest planets lifeless and dead. Nobody came here until now. Rumors and myths about untold wealth spread throughout the galaxy. Adventurers, marauders, soldiers of fortune - all came here to try their chances. But nobody returned.
You are one of "Galactic looters" - band of treasure-hunters and fortune seekers and as everyone before you are here to take as much as you can and get back alive
